fields.headline: Somewhere for now
fields.bodyText: Europe Rome: Two nights at the centrally-located three-star Hotel Gioberti before April 5 costs £289pp including Alitalia flights. Bridge City Breaks (0870 7275917). Spain: Seven nights with golf at the San Roque Club on the Costa del Sol. The price of £477pp includes B&B and green fees. Longshot Golf Holidays (01730 268621, www.longshotgolf.co.uk. Bruges: Two nights' B&B at the Hotel Asiris throughout March cost £109pp from Eurotours. Price includes Eurostar tickets (0870 333 889, www.eurotours.co.uk. Africa Tunisia: A week at the Sol Azur hotel in Hammamet costs £382pp. The price includes flights from Heathrow or Gatwick, departing March 19-25. Wigmore Holidays (020-7836 4999). Caribbean Grenada: Depart throughout February and March from Gatwick for a seven-night, all-inclusive package at the Rex Grenadian for £849pp. Flights every Wednesday and Friday. Caribbean Journeys (0870 709 3020 22). North America San Francisco: Seven nights' room only at a three-star hotel with car hire for £469pp until March 31 from American Journeys (0870 7093020). Hawaii: Two weeks on Oahu for £799pp from March 1 from Page & Moy (08700 106 456), and for another £100 add a two-night stopover in either Las Vegas or Los Angeles. New York: Two nights (three days) at the three-star Newton Hotel for £299pp, including Virgin flights. Travel from now until March 27, book by March 16. Quest Travel (0870 4445552). Asia Kuala Lumpur: From March 3 to April 3, Malaysia's capital holds a shopping sale carnival with discounts of up to 70% and a lifting of import duty on many branded goods. Five nights at the Swiss Garden Hotel costs £527. Asia Direct (0870 789 3335, www.asia-direct.co.uk. Indian Ocean Mauritius: Two weeks for the price of one at the Sugar Beach Resort. (The second week is room only). Valid for stays from March 1 to April 8, the cost is £1,485pp from Expressions Holidays (020-7435 8484, www.expressionsholidays.co.uk. Australasia New South Wales: Spend 11 days exploring the state, flying on February 27. Nights in Sydney, Port Stephens, the Hunter Valley and the Blue Mountains. Price of £724pp includes return flights from Manchester, 10 nights' accommodation and six days' car hire. Austravel (0870 0550206 www.austravel.com.
